name: krdcars
description: krdcars website for cars info and service in Kurdistan

scripts.dev: concurrently -n SERVER,CLIENT -c green,blue "npm run backend-dev" "npm run frontend"
scripts.heroku-prebuild: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build

author: Shazyar-taha <p.shazyar108@gmail.com>
